author: trawick
msg: Update the apr_sendfile() test program to expect APR_EOF/0 bytes
instead of APR_SUCCESS/0 bytes at EOF.

author: trawick
msg: Make the len parm to apr_sendfile() apr_ssize_t * instead of apr_size_t *
for consistency with other APR network send/recv calls.
